bibl.title: Broderick v Haller. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Island 14 July 1857
To Honerable F A Chenoweth one of the Justices of the Supreme Court of the territory of Washington.

The undersined George O Haller to what was eliveated this writ of Habeaus Corpus respectfully showith to the court your honor that in obedience to the requirement of said writ the person therein described as being unlawfully restrained of their liberty are now here subject to the direction and dispersal of your the court
Said persons were by me detained, in Custody for the following reason

1st The said persons are as I have informed and verily believe deserters from Her Brittain Magesty ship Satellite now our duty in the waters of the sound in Connection with and as a part of a joint campain of the goverments of Great Brittan and the United Sates to asertain land determine the boundrary between the propseption of the two goverments on the North West Coast of America Said person as I am informed and believe deserted from said ship while she was lying in the harbor of Port Townsend within the Territory of the United States and they were arrested and detained by me let the
Special request of the officer in command of the said ship Satellite until such time as he can send for them and placed them on board of said ship where they of right belong
G. O. Haller capt. 4th Inf. to Brittain
Sworn to me this 14 day of July AD 1857 Thos Cramely Dist Clerk
